abstract: Spain's borrowing costs plummeted as the European Central Bank began rolling out a new lending program that could encourage banks to buy euro-zone government bonds.
snippet: Spain's borrowing costs plummeted as the European Central Bank began rolling out a new lending program that could encourage banks to buy euro-zone government bonds.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — Spain’s borrowing costs plummeted Tuesday at a debt auction, helping to lift the euro and stocks, as the European Central Bank began rolling out a new lending program that could encourage banks to buy euro-zone government bonds.

headline.print_headline: An Auction Of Debt In Spain Lifts Euro
